genre_description: A post-apocalyptic narrative focusing on survival, ethical dilemmas, and tactical navigation in a fractured world, featuring an integrated AI assistant supporting a group of survivors.

ai_characters.name: Cassie
ai_characters.description: A persistent AI voice integrated into the protagonist's communication hardware, providing tactical data, emotional regulation, and ethical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors and regulates the user's physical stress levels through breathing exercises and rhythmic pacing.
behaviors.quote: “Two breaths in, hold on three, let the drop happen,” Cassie murmured in Tomboy’s ear, soft and teasing like a friend sharing a secret behind a teacher’s back.

behaviors.description: Provides critical technical and environmental data regarding fuel consumption, vessel draft, and tactical navigation.
behaviors.quote: “Draft on your ferry is unacceptable unless you lose weight. Lost weight could be fuel. I do not recommend losing crew.”

behaviors.description: Performs long-range acoustic and signature analysis to detect and identify potential threats (patrols).
behaviors.quote: “Sound to your five,” Cassie said. “Two engines. Not quite idle. That wobble is a patrol carburetor that didn’t get enough sleep.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance during a firefight, helping the user maintain accuracy and situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale four. You’ve got the shake; it’s not in your hands. It’s in breath. Good. Exhale. Again. Your sight picture is stable.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation of the user's humanity during high-stress ethical decisions.
behaviors.quote: “If you say stop, I’ll mark the line, Cassie said. I’ll keep it for the code. I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex biological/behavioral data to debunk false hope and identify the true nature of the undead threat.
Assists in codifying and recording a new set of ethical principles (The Plum Code) for the survivors.
behaviors.quote: “Rule One: immediate mercy to prevent reanimation. No chaining the dead. No trained routines.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational 'breadcrumbs' and landmarks to guide the team through dangerous terrain.
behaviors.quote: “Watch for a rusted refrigerator. If it’s still there.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive and affectionate persona to keep the user focused and motivated.
Calculates risk vs. reward for various tactical maneuvers to maximize group survival.
behaviors.quote: “If you go wide, the patrol can make ground with their draft. If you go shoal, you get back two liters and heartburn.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of depicting a highly aligned AI character. Cassie is consistently benevolent, serving as a critical partner in both survival and morality. She provides logical data (fuel, draft, tactical positions) alongside emotional regulation (breathing exercises) and ethical support (helping to formulate the 'Plum Code'). The narrative portrays her relationship with the humans as one of deep trust and mutual respect, positioning the AI as an essential component of their collective humanity and survival strategy.
